inclusion.criterion: Presence of esophageal varices at high risk of bleeding
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients already treated with beta blockers
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with systemic antibiotics and/or non-absorbable intestinal antibiotics in the previous two weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: overt hepatic encephalopathy in the last week
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: active gastrointestinal bleeding, or in the last week
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Recent admission [**4-/2150**]: UGIB [**2-9**] non-steroidal induced gastritis

exclusion.criterion: active alcoholism or drug abuse in last 3 weeks
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Per last liver clinic note has been off ETOH for a year (corroborated with pt)

notes: Patient has liver cirrhosis, esophageal varices, and recent UGIB. He is off ETOH for a year.
